resources.string: QUIZ: How strong is the Force with you?
1. In Return of the Jedi, Luke Skywalker\’s lightsaber was green. What color was it in the first two movies?
2. Which of these were Darth Sidious\’ Sith apprentices?
3. Whose foul stench did Leia say she recognised on the Death Star?
5. In the Star Wars movies, who was Anakin Skywalker\’s father?
6. What happened to Luke Skywalker\’s right hand after Darth Vader cut it off with a lightsaber?
It presumably fell into Bespin\’s orbit and was never seen again
Luke abandoned it in the carbon-freezing chamber while fighting Vader
Luke\’s friends aboard the Millennium Falcon were able to catch it
7. What were Anakin Skywalker\’s last words in Return of the Jedi?
You were right about me. Tell your sister… you were right.
May the force be with you
You are the last of the Jedi. The force runs strong in you. Pass on… what you have learned.
8. What fatal flaw did the rebels exploit to destroy the first Death Star?
9. Whose DNA was used in the creation of the Clone Army?
10. What micro-organisms are said to be conductors of the Force?
11. How old is Padme Amidala when she\’s elected to the position of Queen of Naboo?
12. Who was the first Jedi to learn how to return from death as a Force Ghost?
Not bad, %s! You scored %d points. You are a Young Padawan. The Force is strong with you, but in order to control it and become a Jedi Knight you need more training.

Great, %s! You scored %d points. You are a Jedi Knight. The Force is powerful with you. Serve well and guard the peace and justice in the Galactic Republic and maybe one day you\'ll become a Jedi Master.
Awesome, %s! You scored %d points. You are a Jedi Master. You\'re mastering force with grace and the Jedi High Council is proud of having you. May the Force be with You!
